name: Remnant (IndieValkyrie)
description:
--This project was created in 5 days by 2 people during the 2020 UE SpringJam. If people enjoy it we will continue developing it into a full game--

You find yourself in the middle of nowhere with no memory of how or why you are there. Fight the cold and solve puzzles to progress through the deserted base and piece together your lost memories...

Controls
[WASD] Movement
[C] Crouch
[Shift] Sprint
[E] Interact
[F] Throw
[Esc] Pause

Devs
IndieValkyrie
RyanStephenGames
